title: Former EPA administrator, activists react to “One Big Beautiful Bill”
description: As President Donald Trump touts a bill currently making its way through Congress as a win for the public, a former regional Environmental Protection Agency administrator is prepared to see devastating cuts to the office that could negatively impact human health.

title: Opinion - Does Trump see an off-ramp for Iran’s leaders and a historic tipping point?
California Focus: Is Newsom’s putative campaign in a bumbling phase?
description: As California Gov. Gavin Newsom pursues the early phases of what looks like a 2028 presidential campaign, he’s running afoul of two realities about his present office: One is that no California governor can hide for long from any issue affecting the state. It’s too big for that and governors – unlike U.S. senators – [...]

title: Week Two of the Iran Crisis: Diplomatic offramp is narrowing but not closed (yet)
Trump renews threat to try to fire Fed Chair Powell in new name-calling attack
description: U.S. President Donald Trump is renewing his talk of potentially trying to fire Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell.

title: Texas, federal government strike deal aiming to speed up state infrastructure projects
description: A new agreement between the Federal Highway Administration and the Texas Department of Transportation will give the state more authority to conduct environmental reviews, a move the government says will accelerate the construction of bridge and highway projects.

title: Why tariffs are already driving some healthcare premiums higher
description: Despite the focus on the price of cars, iPhones and other consumer goods, the Trump administration's tariffs are starting to drive up prices in an entirely different industry – healthcare.
